comment.author: 59856308@N06
comment._content: 1898. These guys were probably between 20 and 30 years old when this photo was taken. That means they were born 1868-1878 more or less .. and that these Louisiana boys' fathers had been in the Civil War .. and here they are fighting for the Union. Just find that interesting for some reason.
